title: Banana Beat
description: Banana Beat is a drum machine with a keyboard that lives in your browser. Set the drum kit and tempo then build your own beat to share with others. Play along to the beat with the included piano on your keyboard. Written entirely with vanilla JavaScript!

title: Bus Mall
description: Mock-up of a item survey to be presented to a focus group. Sets of three unique items are presented to the user each time the user chooses an item. After choosing 25 items, charts appear detailing the statistics of the most popular items.
